text: Pau Riba i Romeva (7 August 1948 â€“ 6 March 2022) was a Spanish folk rock guitarist. www.lull.cat Retrieved 2016-2-23Canet Rock. Els temps estan canviant Enderrock Magazine, issue 224, June 2014, pages 38-44 Riba was born in Palma de Mallorca, Spain. He started working during the 1960s during the counterculture. Riba died from pancreatic cancer on 6 March 2022, at the age of 73. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Spanish musicians Category:Folk musicians Category:Rock guitarists Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer
title: Pau Riba
